backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining website content types, live/draft content storage, and admin-gated APIs for viewing and updating draft content and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to involved frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of frontend files describing functionality across hooks, components, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining warm color tokens for light/dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting up metadata, favicon, dark mode, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app loading live website content with error handling and optionally opening the admin editor dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Component showing unauthenticated or unauthorized access messages with login and admin token instructions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEdito: Admin-only editor dialog handling authentication checks, loading draft content, and enabling content editing and publishing.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChangeEdit: Non-functional placeholder component to satisfy TypeScript requirements for future password-change support.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity and clears queries on logout with error recovery for already-authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name, handling errors and loading states.
frontend/src/components/common/LiveConte: Displays an error message for failed live content loads with retry and page refresh options.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Heade: Provides a responsive header with navigation links and an editor button, including a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Displays a content section with a title, body text, and three feature cards with icons.
Shows a footer with custom text, attribution link, and current year display.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders a customizable hero layout with positioned text and an image, supporting preview mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Returns whether the authenticated caller is an admin along with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousActor.ts: Provides a singleton anonymous actor instance through a cached react-query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousWebsiteCo: Contains hooks for fetching, updating, and publishing draft website content using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, logging in, and clearing identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as content, user profiles, roles, and admin status.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/heroLayout.ts: Maps backend alignment and position values to Tailwind utility classes and provides string conversion helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and configuration for the Waxy Publisher project.
